name: Our Monsters
description:
Our Monsters is a work in progress game that is based around the theme of depression and mental health. Real people were interviewed and asked what depression feels like to them. Our Monsters aims to translate these feelings into game form.

The goal of Our Monsters is to address something that may be hard to talk about. Our Monsters wants to point out that depression is real and can be so different for everyone. 

This game is in early development, and will aim to be finished mid December.

If you are interested in filling out a quick feedback form let me know! It would help so much with development. You can reach me on my twitter DMs @LevitateWind

Thank you for downloading!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move. E to interact. Space to advance dialogue.
